text: Presidential elections were held in Peru in 1903. Manuel Candamo of the Civilista Party was elected unopposed.Fernando Tuesta Soldevilla (2001) Perú politítico en cifras, Friedrich Ebert Stiftung, p610 ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Candidate !Party !Votes !% |- |align=left|Manuel Candamo||align=left|Civilista Party||92,781||100 |- |colspan=2 align=left|Invalid/blank votes||997||− |- |colspan=2 align=left|Total||93,778||100 |- |colspan=2 align=left|Registered voters/turnout||143,142||65.51 |- |align=left colspan=4|Source: Tuesta |} ==References== 1903 Category:1903 elections in South America Category:1903 in Peru
title: 1903 Peruvian presidential election
